about_the_game:
Unlock Alicia as a new romance option in this Date Z DLC! Enter her fiery world where passion and danger meet at Massville High. Get involved in drama fueled by unfulfilled ambitions, spend time at the shooting range, and visit the deserted ATC tower. Be careful—getting close to Alicia might be more intense than you expect.

This DLC gives you:

• Alicia as a new romanceable character

• A drama-filled storyline with unique dialogue options

• Exclusive visuals featuring your new romance

• A completely new game ending
